properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 14.
1. 14 METER S/V ANEGADA, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
   ON BOARD, DISMASTED AND ADRIFT DUE TO NO FUEL,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 14-28.57N 055-38.52W
   AT 101531Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
   TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
   TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
   FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
   E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3980/17.
